bug.author: mikegwf1
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue Description</denchmark-h>
I am building large VPTree's and I would like to save them to an object and reload them as needed. However, they are not Serializable <denchmark-h:h4>Version Information</denchmark-h>
Please indicate relevant versions, including, if relevant:
Deeplearning4j version - 1.0.0-alpha platform information (OS, etc) - Windows CUDA version, if used - N/A NVIDIA driver version, if in use - N/A
<denchmark-h:h4>Contributing</denchmark-h>
If you'd like to help us fix the issue by contributing some code, but would like guidance or help in doing so, please mention it!

comments.comment: Fixed/implemented in my branch. Will be merged once it's safe to.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
